column5: I was wondering if someone could tell me if the small store a few miles north of the border crossing at Pigeon Falls sells beer. If not, where is the nearest beer store on the way to Armstrong? I am trying not to get too far off of 61. I am pretty sure there is no beer store on 527, but maybe I'm wrong. Thanks
yes they sell beer and liqur also can get your license their.
Thanks a bunch, looking forward to REAL Labatt's
